channel.title: Music – and Loathing in Las Vegas
channel.description: Recent content in and Loathing in Las Vegas on Music

item.title: Fear,and Loathing in Las Vegas - Chase the Light! ("逆境無頼カイジ 破戒録篇"OP)
item.description:
Woh

Chase the Light!
데오 노바시타노니
て//の/
手を伸ばしたのに
마다 도도카나이
//とど/
まだ届かない
요고토 세이론
よ///せい/ろん/
夜ごと正論
이야니 나루
いや/
嫌になる
벤리나 이이와케오
べん/り//い//わけ/
便利な言い訳を
하이마와루 쇼-도-
は//まわ//しょう/どう/
這い回る衝動

(From) time

to time,

I feel like

running away

Trying to face away

from this situation

But for me

to live

I have to decide

my own way

Take it easy

It’s gonna be alright

Have faith and trust

what a person you are

In times when you feel

lost believe yourself

Overcome

all the enemies Light

Are you ready?

Let’s go!!

Chill out and be

easygoing sometimes

That was what you’ve

told me in bad times
가라마루 이토 호도이타 도키니
から/// い/と /////とき/
絡まる意図ほどいた時に
와라이타이카라
わら/
笑いたいから
마요에루 히비모
まよ/// ひ/び /
迷える日々も
다시카메루
たし/
確かめる
사가세나쿠테
さが/
探せなくて
메오 소라스케도
め//そ/
目を逸らすけど
기미나라 데키루
きみ/// で/き /
君なら出来る
소노 데오 노바세
//て//の/
その手を伸ばせ

Fog hanged over

Making me blind

I cut through the air

with my hand

And then I realized

I ran into

A wonderland

filled with mysteries

I knew

if I kept

Running

without stopping

I will someday find

the way out from here

Take a look around

Light

Each one of us

shares

Different thoughts

and features

No one is

the same

And that’s

what makes us

The only special

Spring has arrived

Season of new life

has come
소오 도오메이데
///とう/めい/
そう 透明で
마바유이 아시타에
///// あ/した /
まばゆい 明日へ

We all face and go

through tough moments

But with the help

of others

We gain the power

to stand up again
